title: microwave steamed eggplant
instructions: Toss eggplant cubes with salt and let sit for up to 30 minutes.
Pour off any released liquid and pat dry.
Drizzle generously with olive oil and stir to coat.
Place in a microwave-safe steaming vessel and cook for 3–5 minutes at 1200W.
Toss and check seasoning. Cook for another 3–5 minutes.
Add garlic, stir, and cook for 30–60 seconds longer.
notes: This goes great in pasta and red sauce to make a dish similar to Pasta a la Norma.
